chart.title: Number of species threatened with extinction
chart.subtitle: The IUCN Red List has assessed the [extinction risk](#dod:extinction_risk) of only a small share of the total known species in the world. This means the number of species threatened with extinction is likely to be a significant underestimate of the total number of species at risk.
chart.note: 'Threatened' species are those that are categorized as 'Critically endangered', 'Endangered' or 'Vulnerable' on the IUCN Red List.
chart.citation: International Union for Conservation of Nature Red List of Threatened Species (2024)
